title: The general form of the *-commutator on the Grassman algebra
abstract: We study the general form of the *-commutator treated as a deformation of the Poisson bracket on the Grassman algebra. We show that, up to a similarity transformation, there are other deformations of the Poisson bracket in addition to the Moyal commutator (one at even and one at odd n, n is the number of the generators of the Grassman algebra) which are not reduced to the Moyal commutator by a similarity transformation.
